name: Dark ages quest
description:
Quast of dark ages is upon our time and you must defend the land against evil.
Travel across the world and complete different missions and fight agains evil skulls, goblins and trolls that will show up and try to take you out for good!

Dark ages quest is a great game classic allready and most beloved amoung our devoted players all over the world!

Unlock new weapons, characters and different powerups in order to upgrade your character,
Collect cash in the game and use in the shop, invite friends to earn more dough and use it to defend evil for good in Dark ages quest!
